original_text: Because she speaks like that, she will receive many troubles in one single day. Her people will become very ill. They will be very sad. They will have no food to eat. Fire will destroy the city, The Lord God is powerful. So he will punish her with these troubles.’ Because she speaks like that, she will receive many troubles in one single day. Her people will become very ill. They will be very sad. They will have no food to eat. Fire will destroy the city, The Lord God is powerful. So he will punish her with these troubles.’ Because she speaks like that,
korean_text: 그러므로 하루 동안에 그 재앙들이 이르리니 곧 사망과 애통함과 흉년이라 그가 또한 불에 살라지리니 그를 심판하시는 주 하나님은 강하신 자이심이라

sentences.original_text: Her people will become very ill
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀의 백성들은 아주 병들게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will have no food to eat
